page.title: 02Centre 67 - Appleby
page.content: Centre 67 was opened in 1967 for all the public to use.Mrs.Taylor runs the nursery school.Some people help the little ones to do messy things. Play school is run by Jill kendal who has some mothers to help her and some people from the grammar school. The little ones have milk and biscuits and the mothers have coffee and a chat. At Centre 67 there is a youth club on Thursdays from 5.30 to 7.00. There are lots of things like roller skating, playing snooker, games and things like that. Sometimes there are "Have a go" holidays. These are run by Mr Spens the local youth leader.There is canoeing ,sailing, rock climbing for people to try out. There are also other activities such as Young Wives, Sunday School, judo,parties and films. Liz Taylor
